docs.lead_paragraph: A Texas hospital removed a pregnant brain-dead woman from life support on Sunday in line with a court order obtained by her husband who argued the fetus she was carrying was withering inside her lifeless body, the family's lawyers said.

headline.main: Texas Hospital Ends Life Support for Brain-Dead Pregnant Woman
headline.print_headline: Texas Hospital Ends Life Support for Brain-Dead Pregnant Woman

docs.snippet: A Texas hospital removed a pregnant brain-dead woman from life support on Sunday in line with a court order obtained by her husband who argued the fetus she was carrying was withering inside her lifeless body, the family's lawyers said.

headline.main: Freezing Eggs, and Hoarding My Fertility

docs.abstract: For a year, I froze eggs in a frenzy, bloated in fat pants and cranky from hormones; $50,000 later, I had stashed away 70 eggs.
docs.snippet: For a year, I froze eggs in a frenzy, bloated in fat pants and cranky from hormones; $50,000 later, I had stashed away 70 eggs.

docs.lead_paragraph: It’s rare to hear politicians discuss rape and assault with real sensitivity, but that’s just what President Obama and Vice President Biden did.

headline.main: Talking Sexual Violence Without Giving Offense
headline.print_headline: Talking Sexual Violence Without Giving Offense

docs.abstract: Editorial praises Pres Obama and Vice Pres Joseph Biden Jr for managing to talk about sexual violence with real sensitivity when they announced a task force on college campus rape; contends tone matters greatly when it comes to subject of sexual violence.
docs.snippet: It’s rare to hear politicians discuss rape and assault with real sensitivity, but that’s just what President Obama and Vice President Biden did.

docs.lead_paragraph: George Brant, author of many plays produced regionally but never in New York, is enjoying a moment with “Grounded,” about a fighter pilot directing drones.

headline.seo: George Brant’s Play ‘Grounded’ Brings Him to New York

docs.abstract: Playwright George Brant hopes that New York debut of his play Grounded will bring more national attention to the many other plays he has written.
docs.snippet: George Brant, author of many plays produced regionally but never in New York, is enjoying a moment with “Grounded,” about a fighter pilot directing drones.

docs.lead_paragraph: Executives from a Texas hospital conferred with the county district attorney's office Saturday to determine their next step, after a judge ordered the hospital to remove a pregnant, brain-dead woman from life support.

headline.main: Hospital: No Decision on Order to End Life Support
headline.print_headline: Hospital: No Decision on Order to End Life Support

docs.snippet: Executives from a Texas hospital conferred with the county district attorney's office Saturday to determine their next step, after a judge ordered the hospital to remove a pregnant, brain-dead woman from life support.

docs.lead_paragraph: Doctors had cited a Texas law that prevents them from withdrawing or withholding “life-sustaining treatment” from a pregnant patient.

headline.main: Judge Orders Hospital to Remove Pregnant Woman From Life Support
headline.print_headline: Pregnant Woman’s Life Support Ordered Cut

docs.abstract: Texas Judge R H Wallace Jr orders John Peter Smith Hospital to take brain-dead pregnant woman Marlise Munoz off life support, first victory for Munoz's family during two-month battle; standoff raised an emotionally charged debate over end-of-life care, abortion and a Texas law that prohibits medical officials from withdrawing life support from a pregnant patient.
docs.snippet: Doctors had cited a Texas law that prevents them from withdrawing or withholding “life-sustaining treatment” from a pregnant patient.

keywords.value: John Peter Smith Hospital (Fort Worth, Tex)
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: An abortion amendment and a bill on gender equality set a positive example for Europe.
docs.snippet: An abortion amendment and a bill on gender equality set a positive example for Europe.

docs.lead_paragraph: There are certainly lessons to be learned from Bosnia, but it seems that few have been heeded.
docs.snippet: There are certainly lessons to be learned from Bosnia, but it seems that few have been heeded.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Massachusetts woman accused of beating and strangling her pregnant friend, then cutting the fetus from her womb, is set to face a jury almost five years after the gruesome crime.

headline.main: Mass. Woman on Trial in Pal's Killing, Fetus Theft
headline.print_headline: Mass. Woman on Trial in Pal's Killing, Fetus Theft

docs.snippet: A Massachusetts woman accused of beating and strangling her pregnant friend, then cutting the fetus from her womb, is set to face a jury almost five years after the gruesome crime.

docs.lead_paragraph: A judge on Friday ordered a Texas hospital to remove life support for a pregnant, brain-dead woman whose family had argued that she would not want to be kept in that condition.

headline.main: Judge: Remove Life Support for Pregnant Woman
headline.print_headline: Judge: Remove Life Support for Pregnant Woman

docs.snippet: A judge on Friday ordered a Texas hospital to remove life support for a pregnant, brain-dead woman whose family had argued that she would not want to be kept in that condition.
